name: Ismail Khalili
personality: Determined and disciplined, with a strong sense of duty to his country and fellow soldiers. Khalili is also known for his quick thinking and problem-solving abilities, particularly in high-pressure situations.
story: Born and raised in an impoverished community in Iran, Khalili joined the military at a young age as a way to support his family and escape the cycle of poverty. He quickly rose through the ranks, earning a reputation as a skilled and dependable crewman. Despite his success, Khalili remains deeply committed to improving conditions for his fellow soldiers, often advocating for better equipment and resources.
